title: When do Legacy skins show up in shop?
body: I was browsing skins and I wondered when the next time the team skins will be out again foe purchase. Does Riot put them up for purchase every Worlds or what?

replies.body: Sometimes those [**legacy skins**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944#h1) will come back during certain events, but overall they aren't available regularly in the shop. You *do* always have a chance of getting them from mystery skins or hextech loot too though!
